author: mikeshardmind(Sinbad)
name: AntiCommandSpam
short: Temporarily blocks users who spam commands
description: Temporarily blocks users who spam commands
install_message: This cog is still a bit new. You may experience minor issues with it, if this is the case, please report the issues.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. Discord IDs of users may occasionally be logged to file as part of exception logging.
